publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: Articles to be inqvired of : in the metropoliticall visitationof the most Reuerend Father in God, Richard, by the prouidence of God, Lord Arch-bishop of Yorke, Primate of England and Metropolitane. In the yeere of our Lord God, 1633
monogr.author: Church of England, Province of York, Archbishop (1631-1640 : Neile)

div.head: The Aduertisement.
div.p: THe Minister and Church-wardens are to call vnto them the Neyghbours of the Parish, and out of them to make choyce (according to the custome of the place) of two of the discreetest parishioners to bee Side-men, and they altogether are to reade ouer these Articles diuers times. Then, after they haue duely considered of them, they are to write their answere or presentment vnto euery Article particularly and truly, according to their consciences. Lastly, they are all of them to bring their presentments to the Visitation, and there the Church-wardens and Side-men vpon their oathes (but the Minister according to the Canon in that behalfe) are to deliuer them vp vnder their hands.
